ROOT.QUERY:
/* PRODUCE warehouse only: Detect new receipt with newer UBD than previous receipt */ WITH ITEM_RECEIVED AS (SELECT ar_donord, ar_cproin, ar_ilogis, ar_libpro, ul_usscc, ar_fourn, ar_nrsfou, ul_nqteup, TRUNC(ue_datrec) "Receiving date", to_date(ut_valind,''RRRRMMDD'') ut_valind, ue_adrums "Address" FROM tb_eums@HEINENS_STK_PROD t , tb_lcums@HEINENS_STK_PROD , tb_art@HEINENS_STK_PROD, tb_traums@HEINENS_STK_PROD WHERE ue_usscc = ul_usscc AND ue_depot = 95 AND ul_donord=95073 /* Produce only */ AND ue_codtsu = ''1'' AND ar_cproin=ul_cproin AND ar_ilogis=ul_ilogis AND ar_dlc >0 AND UT_TYPIND=''DLC'' and (ue_stapre is null or (ue_stapre in (0, 50) and ue_staums = 1 AND ue_typpre in (''P'',''R'') and ue_typums = ''0'' )) and NVL(ue_indfic,''1'') != ''0'' AND ut_usscc=ul_usscc AND ut_typind=''DLC'') SELECT DISTINCT newrec.ar_fourn "Supplier code", newrec.ar_nrsfou "Supplier desc.", newrec.ar_cproin || ''/'' || newrec.ar_ilogis "Item code/LV", newrec.ar_libpro "Item desc.", to_char(newrec."Receiving date",''MM/DD/RR'') "Received on", to_char(newrec.ut_valind,''MM/DD/RR'') "UBD entered", to_char(oldrec."Receiving date",''MM/DD/RR'') "Previous receipt on", to_char(oldrec.ut_valind,''MM/DD/RR'') "Previous pallet UBD"
FROM ITEM_RECEIVED newrec, ITEM_RECEIVED oldrec WHERE newrec.ar_cproin=oldrec.ar_cproin AND newrec."Receiving date" > oldrec."Receiving date" AND oldrec.ut_valind > newrec.ut_valind
ROOT.HEADER: Produce UBD entered is newer than previous receipt
